text: Max Purcell was the defending champion but lost to Bradley Mousley in the second qualifying round. Thomas Fabbiano won the title after defeating Teymuraz Gabashvili 7–5, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Gimcheon Open ATP Challenger - Singles 2017 Singles
title: 2017 Gimcheon Open ATP Challenger – Singles
